casebody.data:
No. 56,

Misc.

Burgett v. Texas. Petitioner pro se. Waggoner Carr, Attorney General of Texas, Hawthorne Phillips, First Assistant Attorney General, T. B. Wright, Executive Assistant Attorney General, and Charles B. Swanner and Howard M. Fender, Assistant Attorneys General, for respondent.

Ct. Crim. App. Tex. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Case transferred to appellate docket.
